price: Wanan kuwa sabõda Ubangijinka bai kasance Mai halaka alƙaryõyi sabõda wani zãlunci ba ne, alhãli kuwa mutãnensu sunã jãhilai.*
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ أَن لَّمۡ يَكُن رَّبُّكَ مُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا غَٰفِلُونَ
footnotes: * Allah bã Ya halaka mutãne sabõda wani laifi, sai bãyan Ya aiki mai gargaɗi ya tafi ya yi musu gargaɗi, sun san laifinsu, sun ƙi bari, sa'an nan azãba ta je musu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika an lam yakun rabbuka muh'lika al-qurā biẓul'min wa-ahluhā ghāfilūna
